Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: openblockchain is a very outdated and dead doc. ~ChristopherFerris Can the old doc be removed now? Do you have access to do it?

Action.author: mcoblenz
Action.body: openblockchain is the second result from a google search for "fabric java chaincode", and the first is to the Git repository. Where is the revised documentation?

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: Latest doc can be found at: https://hyperledger-fabric.readthedocs.io/en/release-1.3/
